channel.title: Help me with server to get it online!
channel.description:
Alright i'm pretty new will all this but i have been studying on codeing and java platform and this is my first post!
My problem is that i can get on my server on my computer but i cant get on my buddys laptop right beside me...(we both have windows 7) he downloaded the latest java out there and the client will not load up, it will start and flash alittle and go away and not do anything??? i checked all my ip's in my client and my source. i have checked the port and it is open! im useing no-ip and it is up and running?? also i used mopar client and it still didnt let him on so somehow the server isnt letting people on and my client isnt opening up on his comp. but it will on mine.
if anyone can help that would be great.

item.title: Help me with server to get it online!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“southparkis1, post:9, topic:420085”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=522644.msg3801243#msg3801243 date=1320024767]
ohhh edit his run.bat, at put, pause at the end, in place of exit, and give us the error
[/quote]

k did that and it still disaperd but one screen poped up and just says press any key to contenue but never starts up[/quote]
Erm. it sounds like your trying to use compile, not run.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with server to get it online!

item.title: Help me with server to get it online!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

maybe you didn’t portforward right, make sure you don’t have the same 2 ports 43594 to 434594 on your router. like for example: rsps 43594 to 43594 and rsps1 43594 to 43594

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with server to get it online!
item.dc:creator: @southparkis1 southparkis1
item.description:
@southparkis1 wrote:

tyb97:

No, did you set the no-ip in client.java, compile(you must do this if your friend does not have JDK), and upload the client+cache to a file sharing website?

i put it on a flash drive and put it on his laptop. yes i put it in the clint.java and compiled, and also put a cache rar to extract in the c drive, is there anywhere els i have to put the no-ip?

Read full topic
